emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait of fifteen women, including Antoinette Jones fourth from right, standing in courtroom with wood panels, American flag, and door on right
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 9, 1954, pg. 17, reads: "Wife Greeted - A group of Pittsburghers shared the happy hour with Mrs. Antoinette Jones, the councilman's wife, fourth from right, and her visiting relatives."
